Live TV.longDescription: AMC is an American multinational basic cable television channel that is the flagship property of AMC Networks. The channel's programming primarily consists of theatrically released films, along with a limited amount of original programming.
Live TV.shortDescription: AMC is an American multinational basic cable television channel that is the flagship property of AMC Networks. The channel's programming primarily consists of theatrically released films, along with a limited amount of original programming.
Live TV.title: AMC

Live TV.longDescription: BBC America is an American basic cable network that is jointly owned by BBC Studios and AMC Networks. The channel primarily airs sci-fi and action series and films, as well as selected programs from the BBC.
Live TV.shortDescription: BBC America is an American basic cable network that is jointly owned by BBC Studios and AMC Networks. The channel primarily airs sci-fi and action series and films, as well as selected programs from the BBC.
Live TV.title: BBC America

Live TV.longDescription: Reelz is an American digital cable and satellite television network owned by Hubbard Broadcasting. The network's programming was formerly devoted to entertainment-oriented programming focusing on the Hollywood film and entertainment industry, with programs featuring information on theatrical film releases as well as information on movies released on DVD and airing on cable television.

Live TV.title: Reelz

TV Shows.title: Newhart
TV Shows.shortDescription: Dick Loudon and wife Joanna relocate from New York City to a small town in Vermont, where they run the historic Stafford Inn. They're surrounded by a town full of oddballs and colorful characters, whom Loudon deals with in various states of bemusement.

episodes.title: In the Beginning
episodes.shortDescription: New York couple Dick and Joanna Loudon purchase the Stratford Inn in rural Vermont.
episodes.longDescription: New York couple Dick and Joanna Loudon purchase the Stratford Inn in rural Vermont.

episodes.title: Mrs. Newton's Body Lies A-Mould'ring in the Grave
episodes.shortDescription: Dick and Joanna are horrified to discover a 300 year-old grave in their basement belonging to a woman who was hanged as a witch.
episodes.longDescription: Dick and Joanna are horrified to discover a 300 year-old grave in their basement belonging to a woman who was hanged as a witch.

Cartoons/Animation.title: The Scooby-Doo Show
Cartoons/Animation.shortDescription: Scooby Doo, Shaggy and the rest of gang travel in the Mystery Machine and attempt to solve mysteries.

episodes.title: High Rise Hair Raiser
episodes.shortDescription:
Fred, Shaggy and Scooby-Doo get a job from the Acme
Construction Company to work the nightshift while Daphne and Velma find more about the Specter of Ebenezer Crabbe at the Daily Times.
episodes.longDescription:
Fred, Shaggy and Scooby-Doo get a job from the Acme
Construction Company to work the nightshift while Daphne and Velma find more about the Specter of Ebenezer Crabbe at the Daily Times.

episodes.title: The Fiesta Host is an Aztec Ghost
episodes.shortDescription: The gang is in Mexico to attend a fiesta, which gets canceled because of the ghost Katazuma, an ancient Aztec king.
episodes.longDescription: The gang is in Mexico to attend a fiesta, which gets canceled because of the ghost Katazuma, an ancient Aztec king.

Movies.longDescription: He's the wrong person, at the wrong place, at the wrong time. Joe Dirt (David Spade) is a janitor with a mullet hairdo, acid-washed jeans and a dream -- to find the parents that he lost at the Grand Canyon when he was eight. As his wandering, misguided search takes him from one misadventure to another, he finds his way to Los Angeles, where a shock-jock (Dennis Miller) brings Joe on the radio to insult him. But as Joe's story unfolds, jeers turn to cheers, and an entire city is captivated.

But as Joe's story unfolds, jeers turn to cheers, and an entire city is captivated.
